contenuto.Expected Result: Chat is properly displayed with the information about the privacy (1st box)

contenuto.Step Description: Insert a text
contenuto.Expected Result: The combination is correctly suggested with the CTA Mostra significato and the two CTAs "Non ora" and "Inserisci"

contenuto.Step Description: Click on CTA "Inserisci"
contenuto.Expected Result: Combination previously suggested in the chat is correctly inserted in the 1st row

contenuto.Step Description: Insert a text

contenuto.Step Description: Click on CTA "Mostra significato" then "Nascondi significato"
contenuto.Expected Result: Text with related explanation about any single number is displayed correctly and then it's closed properly showing only the combination previously suggested

Titolo: AI Numera - Sisal.it  - Close chat - Desktop_Chrome

contenuto.Step Description: Go to Lotterie/SuperEnalotto after already logging in with username and password
contenuto.Expected Result: Client is properly displayed with no combinations inserted

contenuto.Step Description: Click on CTA AI Numera
contenuto.Expected Result: Chat is correctly displayed with 3 boxes "Informativa privacy", "Welcome message" and text inviting to insert the text related to the dream

contenuto.Step Description: Insert a text
contenuto.Expected Result: Automatic answer is correctly displayed inside the chat with the combination suggested and the two CTA "Non ora" and "Inserisci" appear

contenuto.Step Description: Close the chat pressing X button
contenuto.Expected Result: SuperEnalotto NumberBoard is displayed without combinations inserted (empty - if no combinations were inserted)

contenuto.Step Description: Go to Lotterie/SuperEnalotto after already logging in with username and password
contenuto.Expected Result: Client is properly displayed with no combinations inserted

contenuto.Step Description: Click on CTA AI Numera
contenuto.Expected Result: Chat is correctly displayed with 3 boxes "Informativa privacy", "Welcome message" and text inviting to insert the text related to the dream

contenuto.Step Description: Insert a text
contenuto.Expected Result: Automatic answer is correctly displayed inside the chat with the combination suggested and the two CTA "Non ora" and "Inserisci" appear

contenuto.Step Description: Go to Lotterie/SuperEnalotto after already logging in with username and password
contenuto.Expected Result: Client is properly displayed with no combinations inserted

contenuto.Step Description: Click on CTA AI Numera

contenuto.Step Description: Insert a text

Titolo: AI Numera - Sisal.it - Informative Modal - Prova subito - Desktop_Chrome

contenuto.Step Description:
PRECONDITION : Users are introduced to the new Agent AI feature through an informational modal, shown during their first two visits to the game page in Schedina mode. From this modal, they can activate Agent AI by clicking or tapping the 'Prova subito' button.

Go to Lotterie/SuperEnalotto after already logging in with username and password
contenuto.Expected Result: Informative modal is displayed with the two CTAs "Non ora" and "Prova subito"

contenuto.Step Description: Click on CTA "Prova subito"
contenuto.Expected Result: Chat is correctly displayed

Generate a script loading error modal
